title: Terminal velocity for the coffee filter

content.description: A student is investigating the motion of a coffee filter as it falls to the ground through the air. The student is using a motion detector to gather data for the motion of the coffee filter as it is dropped from rest.
content.question: The mass of the coffee filter is <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>m</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. The magnitude of the drag force of the air on the coffee filter follows the equation <math alttext="F sub D, equals k v squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>F</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>D</mi></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is a positive constant. Which of the following is a correct expression for the terminal velocity of the coffee filter?

choices.label: <math alttext="m g minus k v squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction m g over k v squared" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>k</mi><msup><mrow><mi>v</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction m g over k " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of the fraction m g over k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of, open parenthesis, m g, minus k, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>k</mi></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of the fraction m g over k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msqrt><mrow><mstyle scriptlevel="+1"><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>m</mi><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></mrow></msqrt></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
